name: Color Stack Tower
description:
Tap the color balls to shoot down the color stack tower!

Color Stack Tower is a new low poly hyper casual game that will keep you hooked for hours.

- Swipe to rotate around the tower.
- Tap to shoot the balls and hit the same color blocks.
- You have limited number of color balls.
- Shoot down the tower with minimum balls.
- Enjoy playing the game.
